value_i18n.ar_SA: Liferay has created the upgrade program to help partners upgrade customers while keeping costs to a minimum. As part of this program Liferay offers to help upgrade customers to the latest quarterly release at no cost. As a Liferay Solutions Partner you can then choose to pass on these savings to the customer or use the savings to offset other costs.

value_i18n.ar_SA:
• Partners will be able to submit up to 5 clients who they deem suitable for the upgrade program 

  • The upgrade program is a great expansion opportunity for our partners.

  • This project is scheduled to run through 2024

  • Partners should familiarize themselves with the full program document to ensure they are identifying the right clients for the upgrade project before submitting.

  • Once the application form has been submitted, a Liferay Team member will review the information provided and reach out with further questions or a decision on whether the application has been approved or denied within 2 working weeks.

  • If approved the core upgrade is available at no additional cost to the partner. It is down to the partner’s discretion as to whether costs are transferred to the client. 

  • Any work out of scope of the core upgrade will need to be costed separately and may incur cost to the partner. If approved project timelines, SOW/ contracting and next steps will be defined between you and the Liferay project manager.
